column4: can someone please help me figure out why i don't have sound in flash videos while using Firefox?
what i don't understand is i did nothing different on my desktop than i did on my laptop
sound works everywhere else, just not in flash.
followed that website, still no sound in flash
yes, rebooted the entire system actually
System->Preferences->Sound  what is everything pointed to? pulseuadio or alsa?
I can't find where you are talking about looking
waitasec... did you say Kubuntu or Ubuntu?
big difference there :) sorry about that, you should check out #kubuntu, unless someone else here is familiar with the kde gui
